verbose_text: Given that the increased expression of IL-6 correlated with a decrease in Treg function, which may explain the correlation between RSV infection and asthma sensitization, and IL-8 is the major cytokine known to mediate neutrophil chemotaxis in the lungs, the reduced expression of IL-6 and IL-8 may explain why HDACis exposure decreased neutrophil and T cell infiltration in a mouse model of RSV infection.
